content: fuck the exasperation hat by pam gabriel pamigurumimakes size finished size adult medium will fit 21 23 head approximately 9 tall i like to make my hats just a little bit slouchy but you can adjust the gauge or omit a row of text if you want a more snug fitting beanie gauge 24 stitches and 27 row to 4 inches 10 cm note needles and gauge can be adjusted to fit any size head materials yarn worsted weight main color mc 100 120 yards contrasting color cc 50 yards - more if making a pom pom these amounts are approximate notions pom pom maker #6 4 00 mm 16 circular knitting needles #6 4 00 mm dpns - if not using magic loop method for decreases tapestry needle stitch marker this pattern uses two color stranding and requires the ability to follow a graph you will be using circular knitting needles and should know how to knit purl increase and k2tog stitches k knit m1 make 1 pm place marker p purl k2tog knit 2 together repeat directions using mc co 108 stitches using long tail cast on join in the round being careful not to twist your stitches pm round 1 8 brim k2 p2 around 108 round 9 k54 m1 around 110 round 11 56 follow graph around from rounds 10 27 twice then follow graph around from rounds 10 20 once this will make the body of your hat approximately 8 25 long before decreases if you want your hat to be shorter or longer add or subtract as many motifs as desired round 57 k9 k2tog around 100 round 58 knit 100 round 59 k8 k2tog around 90 round 60 knit 90 round 61 k7 k2tog around 80 round 62 k6 k2tog around 70 round 63 k5 k2tog around 60 this is where i transferred my stitches to dpns round 64 k4 k2tog around 50 round 65 k3 k2tog around 40 round 66 k2 k2tog around 30 round 67 k1 k2tog around 20 round 68 k2tog around 10 cut a long tail and use a tapestry needle to pull the yarn through the open loops weave all ends in and add a pom pom if desired if too snug wet block to loosen up this pattern is the original work of pam gabriel pamigurumimakes reproducing or selling this pattern as your own work is prohibited you may use this pattern for personal use gifts or to sell the finished product if you sell the finished product please credit my pattern in your listing
